channel.title: Herb farming with plant help plz
channel.description: I have been working on farming for some time, and have added every other type of farming in the game, watering, growing, harvesting etc. Everything was going amazing until I hit the herb farming. There is only one herb plant for all of the herbs, and despite any attempts, I cannot seem to make it give you the herb of the seed that you planted. would anyone be able to help me get passed this one thing in farming I cannot seem to get figured out?

item.title: Herb farming with plant help plz
item.dc:creator: @FFkingdom FFkingdom
item.description:

[/quote]
This is runescape classic… not runescape 2
[/quote]

Sorry lol. My bad…miss-clicked last night when I posted.

Read full topic

@FFkingdom wrote:

I have been working on farming for some time, and have added every other type of farming in the game, watering, growing, harvesting etc. Everything was going amazing until I hit the herb farming.
There is only one herb plant for all of the herbs, and despite any attempts, I cannot seem to make it give you the herb of the seed that you planted. would anyone be able to help me get passed this one thing in farming I cannot seem to get figured out?
